info.description: API para sistema de retrospectivas educacionais
info.title: Educ Retro API

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific template
Get categories for a specific template

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, return JWT token
Create a new user account with email, name and password

get.description: Get all retrospectives where the current user is a team member

post.description: Create a new retrospective for a team

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific retrospective
Get all teams where the current user is a member

post.description: Create a new team with the current user as owner

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific team including members

put.description: Update team information (only team owner can update)

delete.description: Delete a team (only team owner can delete)

post.description: Add a new member to the team

delete.description: Remove a member from the team

get.description: Get all available templates for retrospectives

put.description: Update current user's profile information (name and avatar)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
